      • writeRecordToDatabase

        public static void writeRecordToDatabase(int rfid_id,
                         java.lang.String room,
                         java.lang.String owner)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                         java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                         java.lang.Exception
        Writes the given strings to the database
        Parameters:
        rfid_id - int to set
        room - string to set
        owner - string to set
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when database connection close() fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when room or owner is null
        java.lang.Exception - when database setup fails

      • getRecordsFromDatabaseByPartialStringAndColumn

        public static java.util.List<DeviceDatabaseRecord> getRecordsFromDatabaseByPartialStringAndColumn(java.lang.String search_input,
                                                                                  java.lang.String search_option)
                                                                                           throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                                                                                  java.sql.SQLException
        Searches and returns all records that match the search string in the specified column
        Parameters:
        search_input - the string fragment that is searched for
        search_option - the column of the DB-table where the method should search in
        Returns:
        a list of the type DeviceDatabaseRecord containing all records, null when nothing was found
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when error occurs with the database
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - when null or more than one record is returned from the database

      • getRecordsFromDatabase

        public static java.util.List<DeviceDatabaseRecord> getRecordsFromDatabase()
                                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Loops through one table of the database and reads the content
        Returns:
        a string containing all records
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when database connection close fails

        Deletes a given row of the table.
        Parameters:
        record - the record
        Throws:

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when null is passed as argument
